name: 20°C
description:
20°C is a routine game that will allow the player to have the experience of processing photograph which comes with the twisted story. Player will have to run the shop and handle the customer that came in, player will be able to explore the world and story through the words of the customer and find out what happened in the game.

20°C was made by Vivid Dreams, a group of 9 university students. This is our work from the university class. There are bugs within the game, the saving system or the setting might not working correctly but the game can be complete.

Check out our devlog here: https://gamejolt.com/games/20C/529958

Soundtracks: Here
